Detailed Description

Definition of an inventory item.

Each object which is supposed to be added to the INVENTORY has to make use of this structure. Use the INVITEM_create function for creation of a new item.

Field Documentation

long lItemId

Id of item.

The item Id should be unique

void* pfExtRemove

Pointer to specific item removal function.

Attach game specific item property removal function here if e.g. deallocation for the attached object is required. Function parameter: type void* - Pointer to external properties

void* psExt

Pointer to user defined struct or variable.

Attach game specific item properties here (e.g. stats of magic items)

void* psNext

Pointer to next INVITEM in INVENTORY.

Items are arranged in a ring buffer

void* psPrev

Pointer to previous INVITEM in INVENTORY.

Items are arranged in a ring buffer

var vAmount

Amount of item.

May not exceed maximum amount of INVENTORY

var vStackable

Allow item to be stacked.

Some items should not be stackable (e.g. items with random stats like magic weapons)

var vWeight

Weight of item.

May not exceed maximum weight of INVENTORY
